## CI notes (this fork)

The following GitHub checks are considered **non-blocking** for PR readiness and
should be **ignored** (do not wait for them to complete):

- Docker Hub Workflow / build-and-push-backend
- Docker Hub Workflow / build-and-push-frontend
- Update crowdin sources / synchronize-with-crowdin
- Frontend Workflow / test-e2e (chromium)
- Frontend Workflow / test-e2e (firefox)
- Frontend Workflow / test-e2e (webkit)
